snippet.title: Ocarina of Time - Spaceworld '97 BETA Experience - REVEAL Trailer!
snippet.description:
Experience a rare behind-the-scenes look at one of the most beloved games of all time!
Note: This project is a MOD and will NOT be a fully 100% accurate restoration.
Coming soon..

This is a mod of The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time that aims to recreate the demo that attendees of Nintendo Space World in 1997 would have experienced. By harnessing the power of amazing tools and teamwork in a few short months we were able to create this amazing hack for you all to enjoy very soon!

Credits:
~~~ Main Programming ~~~
- Zel
- Fig
- MrCheeze
~~~ Additional Programming ~~~
- Tharo
- louist103
- Aegiker
- CDi-Fails
- Rankaisija
- MelonSpeedruns
~~~ Assets ~~~
- ZeeRoX
- Zel
- Porcino
- CDi-Fails
- Lurondor
~~~ Research & Planning ~~~
- Xiartic
- Porcino
- CDi-Fails
- GlitterBerri
- ZeeRoX
~~~ Translation ~~~
- GlitterBerri
~~~ Debugging ~~~
- Xiartic
- Fig
~~~ Bugtesters ~~~
- Zeth Ryder
- Dark Linkaël
- Syeo
- xShawnxP
- MutantAura
- FantaTanked
- Timato
- AverageGreg
- PaintSkate8
- Phlori
- xwillmarktheplace
- Link11
- jfm
- Noface
- CountLG
~~~ Special Thanks ~~~
- xDaniel
- z64me
- Steven Tyler Sean Herr
- Forest of Illusion
- CloudModding
~~~ Tools ~~~
- Fast64
- Link IK rig from Sauraen
- OoT Decomp (Including ZAPD with added features from Kenix & Jack Walker)

If you would like to support me or my work, please leave like, comment, and subscribe--I would love to hear your feedback! I also have a Patreon where you can help me create content and videos more easily. Every bit of support is much appreciated! Thank you very much!

Stay up to date on my latest projects: https://twitter.com/zel640
Support my work: https://patreon.com/zel640
